  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "HR / Admin Officer",
  "description": "KyDAL Office Point (KOP) is a world class organization which offers wide range solutions for effective and high performance of co-operate setups. We offer tangible supplies for smooth and effective office operations as well as strategic support for high performance and maximum output of personnel by delivering best practice HRM systems and training solutions. Our customized solutions are focused on helping Organizations optimize the potentials of their people - Primary Asset, while providing work tools that maximize output and productivity.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: HR / Admin Officer

Job Location:&nbsp;Ibadan, Oyo
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities


	Creating and maintaining employee records
	Updating internal employee databases
	Creating and amending HR documents, including employment contracts
	Collecting, analysing and reporting HR metrics
	Supporting HR directors and managers to perform their daily responsibilities
	Sorking closely with key stakeholders, including IT, facilities and finance.


&nbsp;Salary
&nbsp;N150,000 - N200,000 per month.

Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;info@kydalofficepoint.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.",

HR / Admin Officer Job at KyDAL Office Point (KOP)




        
    

        
        KyDAL Office Point (KOP) is a world class organization which offers wide range solutions for effective and high performance of co-operate setups. We offer tangible supplies for smooth and effective office operations as well as strategic support for high performance and maximum output of personnel by delivering best practice HRM systems and training solutions. Our customized solutions are focused on helping Organizations optimize the potentials of their people - Primary Asset, while providing work tools that maximize output and productivity.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: HR / Admin Officer

Job Location: Ibadan, Oyo
Employment Type: Full-time
     

            
    



Responsibilities


	Creating and maintaining employee records
	Updating internal employee databases
	Creating and amending HR documents, including employment contracts
	Collecting, analysing and reporting HR metrics
	Supporting HR directors and managers to perform their daily responsibilities
	Sorking closely with key stakeholders, including IT, facilities and finance.


 Salary
 N150,000 - N200,000 per month.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: info@kydalofficepoint.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.    

    

        Click here to Apply

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Sales Representative",
  "description": "Stellar International Company Limited&nbsp;is a subsidiary of RSIN Group which entered Africa in 2008. Stellar International Company Limited&nbsp;has three businesses, namely Recycling Ant, Ant Express and Antshop Online.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Sales Representative

Job Location:&nbsp;Port Harcourt, Rivers
Employment Type: Full-time
Slot: 10 openings

Job Summary


	Stellar International Company (Ant Online Shopping) is expanding its team in PH, we are looking for 10 motivated Sales Representatives to join us.
	If you are goal-driven, persuasive, and passionate about sales, this is a great opportunity to grow with us.


Responsibilities


	Promote and sell company products to customers.
	Build and maintain strong customer relationships.
	Achieve individual and team sales targets.
	Provide excellent customer service and handle inquiries effectively.
	Keep accurate records of sales activities and customer feedback.


Requirements


	Minimum of OND qualification.
	Strong communication and interpersonal skills.
	Previous experience in sales/marketing steel products will be an added advantage.
	Ability to work with targets and deliver results.
	Must reside in PH.


Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;stellarinternationalhr@gmail.com,&nbsp;and cc:&nbsp;stellarinternationaljobs@gmail.com&nbsp;using the Job Position and location as the subject of the email.",

  "validThrough": "2026-04-29",
  "employmentType": "Full-Time",
  "hiringOrganization": {
    "@type": "Organization",
    "name": "Stellar International Company Limited"
    
  },
  "jobLocation": {
    "@type": "Place",
    "address": {
      "@type": "PostalAddress",
       "postalCode": ". ",
       "addressRegion": ". ",
       "streetAddress": ". ",
      "addressLocality": "Rivers (PH)",
      "addressCountry": "NG"
     
      
    }
  },
  "identifier": {
    "@type": "PropertyValue",
    "name": "",
    "value": "194538"
  },
  "baseSalary": {
    "@type": "MonetaryAmount",
    "currency": "NGN",
    "value": {
      "@type": "QuantitativeValue",
      "minValue": 0,
      "maxValue": 0,
      "unitText": "MONTH"
    }
  }
}



Sales Representative Job at Stellar International Company Limited




        
    

        
        Stellar International Company Limited is a subsidiary of RSIN Group which entered Africa in 2008. Stellar International Company Limited has three businesses, namely Recycling Ant, Ant Express and Antshop Online.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Sales Representative

Job Location: Port Harcourt, Rivers
Employment Type: Full-time
Slot: 10 openings

Job Summary
     

            
    




	Stellar International Company (Ant Online Shopping) is expanding its team in PH, we are looking for 10 motivated Sales Representatives to join us.
	If you are goal-driven, persuasive, and passionate about sales, this is a great opportunity to grow with us.


Responsibilities


	Promote and sell company products to customers.
	Build and maintain strong customer relationships.
	Achieve individual and team sales targets.
	Provide excellent customer service and handle inquiries effectively.
	Keep accurate records of sales activities and customer feedback.


Requirements


	Minimum of OND qualification.
	Strong communication and interpersonal skills.
	Previous experience in sales/marketing steel products will be an added advantage.
	Ability to work with targets and deliver results.
	Must reside in PH.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: stellarinternationalhr@gmail.com, and cc: stellarinternationaljobs@gmail.com using the Job Position and location as the subject of the email.    

    

        Click here to Apply
